title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Skills: Trialogical Learning and Assessment for University Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematics fundamentals and undergraduate-level mathematical knowledge
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve collaborative knowledge building in math problem-solving processes through a trialogical learning approach at least 80% of the time
Learners submit at least three reports analyzing real-life applications of mathematical concepts in simulation/VR environments
Learners can diagnose their learning progress with at least 70% accuracy through peer and self-assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
